item.title: Seeking Social Media and Video Content Creator Passionate About Yoga and Retreats - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a professional with experience in social media management and video content creation, who is also passionate about yoga and retreats. The ideal candidate should have the ability to shoot and edit high-quality videos that capture the essence of our yoga retreats and convey our mission and values through social media.

Responsibilities:
Shoot and edit high-quality videos during our yoga retreats.
Create engaging and relevant content for our social media platforms (Instagram, Facebook, YouTube, TikTok, etc.).
Plan and execute content strategies to increase visibility and engagement on our social media channels.
Collaborate with our team to develop creative ideas that resonate with our audience.
Post regularly on our social media and monitor the performance of posts.
Interact with our online community and respond to comments and messages.

Requirements:
Demonstrable experience in video creation and editing.
Strong knowledge of social media management and digital marketing strategies.
Passion for yoga and retreats, preferably with personal experience in practicing yoga.
Exceptional communication skills and ability to work in a team.
Ability to work independently and meet deadlines.

Hourly Range: $8.00-$12.00
Posted On: June 27, 2024 11:07 UTC
Category: Social Media Marketing
Skills:Social Media Marketing, Instagram, Social Media Management, Explainer Video
Skills: Social Media Marketing, Instagram, Social Media Management, Explainer Video
Country: Spain
click to apply

item.title: Social Media Video Assistance - Editing, Advisory, Optimization - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a talented and experienced professional to provide complete social media video assistance for our brand. The ideal candidate will have a strong background in video editing, advisory, and optimization across various platforms such as YouTube and Instagram reels. Your primary responsibilities will include editing videos, providing advisory services on content creation and strategy, and optimizing videos for maximum reach and engagement.

    Skills required for this job/gig:
    - Video editing
    - Content creation
    - Social media marketing
    - Video optimization

    If you have a creative mindset, strong technical skills, and a deep understanding of social media trends, we would love to hear from you. This is a great opportunity to work with a dynamic team and contribute to the growth of our brand.

    Please provide samples of your previous work and indicate your availability for the project.

    We anticipate this job/gig to be of medium size and could be permanent. We are requiring an intermediate level of expertise. We are willing to pay advanced prices for advanced services that deliver outstanding results.

Hourly Range: $8.00-$55.00
Posted On: June 27, 2024 11:07 UTC
Category: Social Media Marketing
Skills:Social Media Marketing, Facebook, Social Media Management, Instagram
Skills: Social Media Marketing, Facebook, Social Media Management, Instagram
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Kickstarter Video Editor - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking a skilled video editor to help us edit our Kickstarter video. We have already filmed the product footage and now need an editor to bring it all together. The video will be 30-45 seconds long and needs to be engaging, dynamic, and visually appealing. You will be responsible for trimming, sequencing, and adding transitions, effects, and background music to enhance the overall impact. The ideal candidate should have experience with Kickstarter videos or similar promotional content. Attention to detail, creativity, and the ability to meet deadlines are essential skills for this project.

Skills required:
- Video editing
- Familiarity with video editing software
- Ability to add transitions, effects, and background music
- Attention to detail
- Creativity
- Ability to meet deadlines


Posted On: June 27, 2024 11:01 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Video Production, Video Post-Editing, Video Commercial, Adobe After Effects
Skills: Video Editing, Video Production, Video Post-Editing, Video Commercial, Adobe After Effects
Country: United States

item.title: Video Editor and Virtual Assistant | CLEAVER Creative - Upwork
item.description:
We are:
CLEAVER Creative is a national video, podcast, and social media production company with over ten years of experience. We've made 1,000’s of videos and pleased just as many clients! Some of our clients include Accenture, Salesforce SAP, AT&T, ComED, and Fifth Third Bank. The list keeps growing, just like the opportunities.

Currently, we are looking to bring in someone, on a freelance basis, to work as a virtual assistant. Tasks will include video editing for social media, transcribing video, and animation.

What we value most is finding working people who deliver on time.

You are:
Are self-motivated
Excellent with time management
Love to learn
Interested in video editing and post-production

As a virtual assistant for CLEAVER Creative, you’ll use your ability to multi-task, prioritize, and manage your time to help us create awesome content for creatives and business professionals across social media.

We look forward to hearing from you!

Check us out:
https://www.cleavercreates.com


Hourly Range: $4.00-$5.00
Posted On: June 27, 2024 10:46 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Adobe After Effects, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Editing, Promotional Video, Explainer Video, Data Entry, Virtual Assistance
Skills: Adobe After Effects, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Editing, Promotional Video, Explainer Video, Data Entry, Virtual Assistance

item.title: Android/IOS game trailer - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a talented video editor to create an engaging game trailer for our Android and IOS game. The trailer should be approximately 1-2 minutes long and showcase the gameplay, graphics, and key features of the game. The video should be visually appealing, with smooth transitions, captivating music, and high-quality effects.
  As a video editor, you should have experience with game trailers and a strong understanding of video editing software. You should be able to bring creative ideas to the table and work collaboratively with our team to bring our vision to life.
  Skills needed:
  - Video editing
  - Game trailer production
  - Easy to work with
  - Creative thinking
  - Attention to detail

This is the style we are looking for:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=GWEhiZPjfPA
(in terms of drawing and the mix between animations and in game footage.)

We are a small hobby game company so you will be our expert in this project. Hope it sounds interesting, feel free to write if you have any questions!


Budget: $425
Posted On: June 27, 2024 10:40 UTC
Category: Video Production
Skills:Video Commercial, Video Animation, Game Trailer
Skills: Video Commercial, Video Animation, Game Trailer
Country: Sweden
click to apply

item.title: Female TikTok & Instagram creator - Upwork
item.description:
*Do not apply if your want to offer your rate card, this a fixed contract only open to reasonable negations*
Lets not waste each others time please. This be a recurring job every month and we will continue improve the offer with every passing month. Looking forward to meeting you.

We are looking for a talented female Instagram and TikTok creator to produce faceless content for various brands including jewelry, phone cases, plush toys, etc. The content will consist of 100 & Product photos with videos ranging from 5 to 15 seconds each. As a creator, you will be responsible for capturing the attention of our target audience through captivating and creative videos that showcase the products in an engaging way But we will also provide a lot of guidance for the job to make it as smooth as possible.

    Skills required:
    - Proficient in video creation and editing
    - Strong understanding of Instagram and TikTok trends and features
    - Ability to create visually appealing and attention-grabbing content
    - Familiarity with popular jewelry, phone case, and plush toy brands
    - Excellent communication and collaboration skills

    This is a medium-sized project with a duration of 1. We are looking for an intermediate-level creator who can bring fresh ideas and creativity to our brand. If you are passionate about creating viral content and have a knack for showcasing products in a unique way, we would love to hear from you!

*Please do keep in mind this is not the rate per video but the entire Job*

Budget: $350
Posted On: June 27, 2024 10:26 UTC
Category: Content Strategy
Skills:Instagram, Social Media Content, TikTok Video
Skills: Instagram, Social Media Content, TikTok Video
Country: NLD
click to apply

item.title: Professional Wedding Slideshow Designer - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a talented and creative professional to design an impressive image slideshow video for our wedding dinner. The slideshow should showcase a collection of images from our special day as well as featuring our adorable pet cats. We are seeking someone with innovative ideas and a keen eye for aesthetics to create a visually stunning and memorable slideshow. The ideal candidate should have experience in designing slideshows for weddings or special events.
  Skills required:
  - Proficiency in slideshow design software
  - Strong creative and artistic skills
  - Ability to curate and arrange images effectively
  - Attention to detail and excellent time management skills

  If you are passionate about creating visually captivating slideshows, we would love to work with you on this project. Please provide samples of your previous work in a similar domain.

Budget: $14

item.title: Creative Video Editor for Dynamic Ad Campaigns (Facebook Ads, Tiktok Ads..) - Upwork
item.description:
Hi!

We are on the hunt for a talented video editor with a passion for crafting high-impact ads tailored for Facebook, TikTok, and Instagram. If you have the skill to capture attention with engaging hooks and keep viewers glued to their screens, you might be exactly who we need.

What We Need:

Exceptional video editing and design skills.
A proven track record of creating captivating hooks that grab attention instantly.
Experience in producing videos that not only hold viewer attention but also achieve high click-through rates.

Responsibilities:

Develop and edit video content specific to each platform, ensuring optimal visibility and conversion.
Work collaboratively with our marketing team to ensure video content aligns with our brand's voice and campaign goals.
Regularly test and refine video creatives to maximize performance.

Requirements:

A strong portfolio demonstrating successful ad campaigns and high levels of viewer engagement.
Proficiency with the latest video editing software and graphic design tools.
Independent work ethic and the ability to meet deadlines reliably.
This position offers an exciting opportunity for those who thrive on staying at the forefront of digital advertising and are driven by the challenge of maximizing the impact of every second in a video ad.

If you are ready to create ads that make people stop, watch, and click, we encourage you to apply. Please send your portfolio and a brief cover letter explaining why you are the ideal candidate for this role.

We are excited to see your creativity in action!


Posted On: June 27, 2024 10:16 UTC
Category: Video Production
Skills:Testimonial Video, Video Commercial, Adobe Premiere Pro, Social Media Advertising, Social Media Marketing, Facebook Advertising, Facebook, Instagram, TikTok Ad, Social Media Management
Skills: Testimonial Video, Video Commercial, Adobe Premiere Pro, Social Media Advertising, Social Media Marketing, Facebook Advertising, Facebook, Instagram, TikTok Ad, Social Media Management
Country: United States
click to apply
